# Sandboxes and Demos

## Sandboxes

1. http://aws-uswest2-binder.pangeo.io
2. http://binder.pangeo.io
3. https://sandbox.test.frontiersi.io

Notes:

1. This sandbox uses binder in uswest2
2. This uses Google Cloud Platform
3. This is fortiersi for ODC
	- could be used to test ODC things


## USGS Sandboxing

1. The littleist Hub - CHS
	- iac: https://github.com/tonybutzer/iac/blob/master/tfinfra/little-big-hub/files/os_boot.sh
	- jup: https://github.com/tonybutzer/jup/blob/master/juphub/pkg/Makefile
		- make boot
	- https://github.com/tonybutzer/jup/blob/master/juphub/docs/source/littlehub.md
	- 
2. pangeo.chs.usgs.gov -- # Earthmap
